title: Synadia and TigerBeetle Commit $512k USD to the Zig Software Foundation
author: derekcollison
aiHeadline: Synadia and TigerBeetle throw more money at Zig Foundation, proving that throwing money at problems is the best way to solve them.

title: Meet the real screen addicts: the elderly
author: johntfella
aiHeadline: Elderly folks are the real screen addicts, because apparently, 'screen time' is now a thing for people who remember when screens were just TVs.

title: React vs. Backbone in 2025
author: mjsu
aiHeadline: React vs. Backbone: because in 2025, we're still arguing about which JavaScript framework is better, and somehow React is still here.

title: Key IOCs for Pegasus and Predator Spyware Removed with iOS 26 Update
author: transpute
aiHeadline: Apple finally removes some spyware stuff in iOS 26, because apparently, 'security updates' are a thing that happen every now and then.

title: We do not have sufficient links to the UK for Online Safety Act to be applicable
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: UK's Online Safety Act doesn't apply because we don't have enough links to the UK, proving that the internet is just a bunch of disconnected islands.
